props.Name: Tavern
props.Description: [Quest] This may once have been a well-off farm, but no more. Dangers aside, the [faction] want this place cleared out and you could certainly use their support.
props.Encounters: Robber Band;Hired Thugs;Brawlers;Guards;Cutthroats;Killer Crew;Bandit Lord;Warband;Dwarf Rabble;Dwarven Company;

props.Dev_Notes: Arcane Brotherhood;Conjurer; Marble Column(3-0);Marble Column(3-4);Marble Column(5-0);
props.Name: Arcane Tower
props.Description: Standing aloof at the feet of the Pale Mountains, this tower is rumored to have appear out of nothing overnight and now house a powerful sorceror or sorceress... There is an aura of unnatural cold and stillness, eerie even by Dusk Dale standards.
props.Lore: A perfectly likely place to start on the search, this tower is almost certain to have some clues about the Artifacts' present or past.
props.Encounters: Dark Apostates;Mutant Band;Eldritch Order;Sewer Horrors;Unchained Wyvern;

props.Name: Demon Shrine
props.Description: A long accursed place, this once splendid Eledari temple of elements has seen a gruesome transformation by fire, blood and sorcery.
props.Lore: Whatever particular sect holds its gatherings in this grim shrine, they are likely to have information about the Artifacts of Mastery. It's doubtful that they will offer it freely though.
props.Encounters: Lesser Demons;Demon Worshippers;Demon Callers;Abyssal Fiend;Warp Champion;

props.Name: Cemetary
props.Description: Strangely, the white marble crypt in the middle of the cemetary seems to have resisted any harm from marauders and grave looters whose work is all too apparent in the multitude of desecrated graves strewn across the cemetary. Unless the graves dug up themselves, of course...
props.Lore: The ancient elven crypt at the center of this dilapidated human cemetary is a promising place to find out more about the history of the Artifacts. Who knows what secrets are kept by the elves long dead?

props.Alt_Encounters: Shades; Death Worshippers;Dark Apostates;Hungry Dead;Bone Dragon;Dungeon Terrors;Blood Thralls;
props.Name: Dungeon
props.Description: As little as you may like it, this is the place incicated by [faction]. There is no knowing what may lurk in these shadowy halls...
props.Encounters: Dungeon Critters;Dungeon Monsters;Dungeon Terrors;Sewer Horrors;Unchained Wyvern;Ancient Beast;

props.Name: Crystal Cave
props.Description: Infested by some manner of insectoids, if rumors are to be believed, this cave radiates strange energy and emanates light that is probably not coming from any purely natural source...
props.Lore: Although it is highly unlikely that there are clues about the Artifacts in a place like this, acquiring shards of a pure Aspect Crystal may be very useful - either as a prize to sell for information, or a source of magical power to aid the quest.

props.Name: Hidden Camp
props.Description: Your tracking has led you to this site which upon closer inspection seems to be hosting a well-hidden camp... no friendly folk would likely be living in such a place.

props.Name: Wizard Tower
props.Description: Standing aloof at the feet of the Pale Mountains, this tower is rumored to have appear out of nothing overnight and now house a powerful sorceror or sorceress... There is an aura of unnatural cold and stillness, eerie even by Dusk Dale standards.
props.Lore: A perfectly likely place to start on the search, this tower is almost certain to have some clues about the Artifacts' present or past.
props.Encounters: Derelict Machinery;Discarded and Orphaned Familiars;Arcane Guardians;Aether Golem;Mechanicum Titan;

props.Lore: A perfectly likely place to start on the search, this tower is almost certain to have some clues about the Artifacts' present or past.

props.Name: Shadow Keep
props.Description: [Quest] This may once have been a well-off farm, but no more. Dangers aside, the [faction] want this place cleared out and you could certainly use their support.

props.Lore: Despite its crudeness, this fort has withstood the test of time better than most structures in the region
props.Name: Ruined Fort
props.Description: [faction leader] has indicated this to be the likeliest place to search for [party].

props.Alt_Encounters: Chaos Apostates;Demon Worshippers;Chaos Minions;Chaos Legion;Abyssal Fiend;Demon Lord;
props.Name: Cavern
Forlorn Ruins
props.Lore: Your information indicates that some of the Scrolls may be hidden in a place that resembles what these ruins might have once looked like.
